amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 118-142 to require the President, in coordination with the Secretary of Defense and Secretary of State, to develop and submit a report to Congress that contains a strategy for U.S. involvement in Ukraine.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require the President, in coordination with the Secretary of Defense and Secretary of State, to develop and submit a report to Congress that contains a strategy for U.S. involvement in Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 301 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Davidson.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Davidson amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 301 (Roll no. 306).
